</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3 </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Interaction </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Set min/max movement borders displayed in HUD gauges. Use -1 to skip some value.  </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''setHUDMovementLevels''' [minSpeed, maxSpeed, minAlt, maxAlt, minDir, maxDir, targetOrPosition] </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [minSpeed, maxSpeed, minAlt, maxAlt, minDir, maxDir, position]: [[Array]]  </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value> 

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> minSpeed: [[Number]] - Units: m/s </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
